actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Bomar to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to permit such vessel to engage in the coastwide trade and fishing.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Bomar to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.
